lead_paragraph: EAST RUTHERFORD, N.J. — Brook Lopez fell somewhat in the N.B.A.’s draft. Ryan Anderson rose somewhat. Together, they landed with the Nets, the organization’s big-man bounty of first-round selections. From competitors to collaborators, they now confront a jarring transitional period otherwise known as the rookie season.
